relation: their is always other organizations that have things on campus, but most of all attending a football game and supporting our hornet is the best.
the cafeteria has wonderful food. you have variety of food choices to choose from.
the dorm life is great. it is constantly growing. good way to meet new people.
when their is an assignment or test study. know your information. use your many resources around campus to get helped if needed.
know what you want to get your degree in. the quicker you make your decision the quicker you will finish.
this university has outstanding staff. able to get one on one teaching with your teacher. this campus keeps students active, and allow stduents to partake in many different opportunities.
pageTitle: Alabama State University (ASU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {268718=There are not many food choices on campus like other universities we have a cafeteria that's open 3 times a day. Are cafeteria is all you can eat Monday-Friday breakfast opens at 6:00 a.m. till 8:00 a.m. Lunch opens at 11:00 a.m. till 1:30 p.m. and dinner opens at 4:00 p.m. till 6:30 p.m. Saturday and Sunday the cafeteria is open twice a day Brunch opens at 6:00 a.m. till 1:30 p.m. and dinner from 4:00 p.m. till 6:30 p.m. If you don't want to eat in the cafeteria we have a student union that has a subway, chicken place, pizza place, and also a place that sells soul food. The union closes at 11:00 p.m. everyday., 287706=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 18992=Tuition is starting to sky rocket all around the U.S. At our school we have a low cost of tuition. Since there is a 2020 vision set in place, a lot of new and exciting things are being enhanced on campus. We now have a new student union and a new football stadium is being built at this very instance. I assure you, you will see your money being put to use., 267375=The campus shuts down everyday at 8:00 p.m. so after that you have to go threw the main checkpoint in the front of the campus to get back onto campus and you have to show your student id., 70122=we have a honors day convocation that takes place in april of every year.its usually packed to capacity and each student achieves a 3.2 or higher.the academic rigor is always excellent and consistent.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students we have a great education program with a new education building also we also have a new life and science building Tips for prospective students your going to get your money worth and their fixing the school up so we can have more entertainment Bang for the buck my tuition is not that expensive so that's good Am enjoying being here Sometimes i don't i complain alot about some of the things like how we have curfews and i think the visitation rights are not fair but i wont leave because i made friends Am learning a lot Yes I'm learning alot but sometimes it can be frustrating because this is college and its so different than high school Login to rate or flag the reviews kiana from Lockhart, AL 10/21/2009 Reviewer is Researching this school.
